description: This file is a shell script that configures GRE tunnels, network interfaces, and system events related to hotspot and GRE configurations. It includes functions for creating tunnels, setting system events, and updating firewall rules.

methods.name: init_snooper_sysevents
methods.description: Initializes snooper system events by enabling circuit and remote snooper logs.

methods.name: read_init_params
methods.description: Retrieves initial parameters from PSM database for GRE and hotspot configurations.

methods.name: create_tunnel
methods.description: Creates a GRE tunnel, configures network interfaces, and bridges for hotspot operation.

methods.name: init_keepalive_sysevents
methods.description: Updates system events with hotspot primary, secondary, and keepalive parameters.

methods.name: update_bridge_config
methods.description: Sets iptables rules for forwarding and NFQUEUE filtering.
